text: Michael John Sutton (5 October 1944 - 26 December 2020) was an English professional footballer. He was born in Norwich, England. His playing career lasted from 1962 to 1984. He played for Norwich City, Chester City, Carlisle United and Great Yarmouth Town. Sutton died of dementia-related problems on 26 December 2020 at the age of 76.Celtic idol Chris Sutton reveals dad Mike has died as he pays tribute to his hero ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from dementia Category:English footballers Category:Sportspeople from Norwich
title: Mike Sutton (footballer)
